---
title: "__init__"
description: "Initialize an AgentsClient instance"
---



Configures the client to use the "agents" endpoint path and sets optional API key and server URL for authentication and server configuration. The initial state has no recorded agent response.



## Parameters

<ParamField path="root_client" type="NotteClient" required>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="api_key" type="UnionType[str, None]" default="None">
  Optional API key for authenticating requests.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="server_url" type="UnionType[str, None]" default="None">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="verbose" type="bool" default="False">
</ParamField>
